info.title: Welcome to SIMPL
info.subTitle: In order to access this data space you will need the following:
info.descriptionStep1: Register to obtain new credentials. An email, organization name and participant type are required.
info.descriptionStep2: After logging in, complete the onboarding procedure
info.descriptionStep3: Wait for a system administrator to approve the onboarding request

requestApplication.title: Welcome to SIMPL
requestApplication.name: Name
requestApplication.passwordRequirements: Must be 8 character long minimum,contain at least one number, one special character, one lowercase and one uppercase letter.

result.subTitle: You successfully created an account. Find below the access credentials
result.button: Go to the application submission form â†’

requestApplication.errorUnique: A participant with this data is already present, check email, organisation or username

requestOnboarding.title: Welcome to SIMPL
requestOnboarding.label: Upload file
requestOnboarding.subTitle: Onboarding procedure for {{participantType}} user types.
requestOnboarding.expiryMessage: This procedure must be completed within {{participantType}} from the first submit.
requestOnboarding.labelComment: Type your comment here. Plain text only.
requestOnboarding.errorSubmit: Error while sending request. Please try again.
requestOnboarding.errorFileDeleted: Error while deleting file. Please try again.
requestOnboarding.errorSendComment: Error while submitting comment. Please try again.
requestOnboarding.errorDownload: Error while downloading the file. Please try again.
requestOnboarding.submitMessage: The onboarding request will be submitted for approval and no further actions are allowed after the submission. Please make sure you have added all documents and comments before submitting the request.
requestOnboarding.messageCSR: Please wait while the system completes the evaluation of your request file.
requestOnboarding.messageCSROK: Request successfully processed. You can now download your credentials.
requestOnboarding.messageCSRError: There was an error processing your request. please try again later.

administration.title: Request list
administration.empty: There are currently no onboarding requests.
administration.approveSuccess: You successfully approved this request. A set of credentials was created for the applicant.
administration.approve-request-detail-modal-message: Do you confirm the onboarding request for {{email}}?
administration.reject-request-detail-modal-message: Do you reject the onboarding request for {{email}}?
administration.confirmDeletionIdentityAttributeMessage: Confirm deletion of {{code}} attribute from participant
administration.messageReject: Provide a rejection reason for this action. The reason will be displayed in the comment section.
administration.notYetUpload: The applicant has not yet uploaded any files. Check back again later.
administration.messageNewDocument: Fill in the details of the new document request. This document will be marked as mandatory by default. The applicant will be notified as soon as the request form is saved.
administration.requestInformationError: Error when confirming new documents. Please try again.
administration.requestRevisionMessage: By requesting a revision the application will be able to address all the issues raised by the Notary (comments or request for new documents).

status.title: Welcome to SIMPL
status.subTitle: You successfully completed your onboarding request an account.

participantType.title: Participant types
participantType.name: Name
participantType.deleteSuccess: You successfully deleted an attribute from the participant type
participantType.addSuccess: You successfully added some attributes to the participant type
participantType.confirmDeletionMessage: Confirm deletion of {{code}} from selected participant type

simpleInput.confirmRevokeMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke permanently this participant's access?

unauthorized.title: Role Restricted Access
unauthorized.message: Access denied. Your role does not grant permission to view this content.

message.400: Your request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax or invalid parameters. Please check the data you submitted.
message.401: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please ensure you are logged in with the correct credentials.
message.403: You do not have permission to access this resource. Check your access privileges.
message.404: The resource you are looking for could not be found on the server. Please verify the URL or contact support.
message.500: The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Please try again later.
message.501: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
message.502: The server, acting as a gateway, received an invalid response from the upstream server.
message.503: The server is currently unavailable due to overload or maintenance. Please try again later.
message.504: The server, acting as a gateway, did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
message.505: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.
message.508: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.
message.511: The client must authenticate to gain network access.

onboardingProcedures.title: Onboarding Procedures
onboardingProcedures.emptyConditions: Unless a procedure is set, onboarding will not be permitted for this participant type.
onboardingProcedures.changeTabMessage: If you leave the editing procedure without saving all your work will be lost. Do you want to exit the procedure now?

onboardingTemplate.templateDescriptionPlaceholder: A human-readable description of the procedure
onboardingTemplate.expirationTimeframeHint: Values must be expressed in seconds, range is between 0 (no expiration) and 15.000.000 (six months)
onboardingTemplate.descriptionPlaceholder: A description of the document that clarifies some details of the document to be uploaded. Keep it concise and readable.
onboardingTemplate.name: Name
onboardingTemplate.namePlaceholder: A short name to make the document recognizable at a glance

userInformationPage.title: Users list
userInformationPage.noRoles: No role for the selected user.

newUser.title: New User
newUser.required: Field is required and cannot be empty

roleDetail.messageChanges: This will change the attributes of this role potentially affecting a lot of many of user, do you wish to proceed ?
roleDetail.updateErrorMessage: Changes could not be saved. PLease try again later.
